content:
Lloyd McKenzie said:

Looks like this was addressed by HQ already sometime today. It can take 1-2 business days for someone to review and ensure you do indeed appear to be a real human.

Hi @Lloyd McKenzie :wave: I'm just reaching out to see if there's any progress on this issue NEWID-3417. I can't seem to find a response email on my inbox or spam related to this. Kindly see if you can help me out. :smile: :pray: I will appreciate any communication on this. Thanks

Hmm. Got rejected for a reason I don't understand. (Most likely someone clicked on the wrong button and didn't realize their error.) I've re-opened and approved. Send me a PM if you don't get the email to reset your password.
Awesome! Thanks @Lloyd McKenzie :pray:
